abstract.title: Graphical abstract
abstract.p: This result reveals that transmission dynamics of COVID-19 is due to two mechanisms given by: human-to-human transmission (measured with density of population) and air pollution-to-human transmission (airborne viral infectivity); in polluting citieswith low wind speed, the accelerated diffusion of viral infectivity is also due to mechanism of air pollution-to-human transmission that may be stronger than human-to-human transmission.
